description:
Log unlimited loop events log？ Is this normal? 
Openstack is working fine, but i think events are problematic. Neutron-server and dhcp-agent also appear a lot of log content related to events

root@controller01 ~]# tail -f /var/log/nova/nova-api.log

title: nova  event

comments.content:
Log unlimited loop events log？ Is this normal? 
Openstack is working fine, but i think events are problematic. Neutron-server and dhcp-agent also appear a lot of log content related to events

root@controller01 ~]# tail -f /var/log/nova/nova-api.log

comments.content: The external events API is a rest api call, we always log those
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague
